result.execSummary:
All charges against Reed R. Trefz in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Reed R. Trefz is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Reed R. Trefz

records.addlTxt: Defendant Reed R. Trefz appeared by phone.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder appeared by phone for Reed R. Trefz. State moves to dismiss case. Court grants dismissal.

Status conference on August 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

You may join this hearing by video using the following website: https://wicourts.zoom.us/j/600348151 (meeting ID: 600-348-151).  To appear by video, you will need a web camera and microphone.  If you are unable to join by internet using video, you may join the hearing by phone by calling 1-312-626-6799 (meeting ID: 600-348-151). If you wish to appear in person, please contact Judge VanDeHey's Judicial Assistant at (608) 723-7826.

Defendant Reed R. Trefz in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Reed R. Trefz. Attorney Sauder heard on status of case and there has been no change. Requests trial date. Attorney Sauder heard on State's motion. Jury trial set.
Jury selection scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Reed R. Trefz in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder in court for Reed R. Trefz. Attorney Sauder requests another status date. Trial was set for July 18, 2022, but deputy is gone for training. Court sets continued status and new trial date.
Status conference scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Jury trial scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on July 6, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Defendant Reed R. Trefz in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morgan Sauder appeared by video for Reed R. Trefz. There is no agreement with the DA yet. Attorney Saunder is hoping to come to an agreement before trial. More time is requested if it does go to trial. No comment from State on continuance. Attorney Saunder has not received video footage. Has sent numerous request to prison. Court sets final status date to make sure all evidence has been gathered.
Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on March 16, 2022 at 11:00 am.

and Arraignment. 

Defendant Reed R. Trefz appeared in court, Attorney Morgan Sauder appeared by zoom video for Reed R. Trefz, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant acknowledges service and waives further reading. Court reviews charges and penalties with defendant, Court sets $500 signature bond. Defendant pleas not Guilty to the charge. Court accepts. Sets for Status: 3/16/22 at 11:00 a.m. Jury Trial weeks: 3/29 and 4/5.
Jury trial scheduled for March 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.
